name: Finger Balls!
description:
Hit the ball and don’t let it touch the ground. Throw the ball through the rings to see astonishing effects and get additional score. Try to play with several Balls simultaneously - challenging, but rewarding.

Complete the challenges to unlock new cool and funny Balls with their unique effects. Complete all the challenges to unlock the Ultimate Skin.

Complete the tough levels with different mechanics to prove that you are the best of the best and unlock even more Balls!
